requirements.summary: Create bold landing page with motivational message
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays the exact message 'Make a change today and thank you for tomorrow'
Message is visually prominent with bold typography
Landing page serves as the app entry point

file_operations.description: Add routing structure with landing page as the root route. Include routes for walk tracking, photo transformation, and theme settings pages.

Create landing page component displaying the motivational message 'Make a change today and thank you for tomorrow' with bold typography. Include hero-fitness.dim_1920x1080.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-fitness.dim_1920x1080.png as background. Include transform-icon.dim_256x256.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/transform-icon.dim_256x256.png as a visual element. Add navigation to main app features.

requirements.summary: Implement customizable color themes with persistence
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select from multiple predefined color themes
Theme selection persists across sessions
Theme changes apply consistently across all app pages
Theme preferences are stored in backend user state

file_operations.description: Create React context for theme management. Load current theme from backend using getTheme(). Provide theme switching function that calls setTheme(themeName) on backend. Apply theme colors to CSS variables for global access.
Wrap app with ThemeContext.Provider to enable theme management across all components. Ensure theme colors are applied globally.
Create theme selector UI component that displays available themes and allows users to switch between them. Use theme context to trigger theme changes.
Create settings page that includes ThemeSelector component for theme customization.

requirements.summary: Build AI-powered photo transformation feature with upload and projection
acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload a photo from their device
Users can select a duration in months (e.g., 1, 3, 6, 12 months)
System generates a projected transformation image based on the selected duration
Generated transformation is displayed alongside the original photo
Transformation images are stored and retrievable

file_operations.description: Create transformation page with photo upload UI using file input. Use the blob-storage component to handle photo uploads via ExternalBlob.fromBytes() and track upload progress with withUploadProgress(). Include month selector dropdown (1, 3, 6, 12 months). Call uploadPhoto(photo) backend method to store uploaded image. Display original and generated transformation images side-by-side. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create reusable photo upload component with drag-and-drop support and file input. Use blob-storage component's ExternalBlob.fromBytes() for file handling. Display upload progress indicator. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create component to display before/after transformation images side-by-side. Use blob-storage component's ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() to display images efficiently with streaming and caching. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Create location tracking tab with interactive map and start/stop controls
acceptanceCriteria: Dedicated tab displays an interactive map
Start button initiates walk tracking and begins recording route
Stop button ends tracking session
Map displays the walk route in real-time during tracking
Route path is visible on the map after tracking stops

file_operations.description: Create walk tracking page with interactive map display. Implement start/stop buttons to control tracking session. Track location coordinates during active session using browser Geolocation API. Display route path on map in real-time and after session ends. Render map using canvas or SVG for route visualization without external mapping APIs.
Create map component that renders walking routes using canvas or SVG. Accept coordinate arrays as props and draw route paths. Support real-time updates during active tracking sessions.

Create custom hook to manage location tracking state. Use browser Geolocation API to get position updates. Track coordinates, distance, and duration during active session. Calculate step count based on movement patterns.

requirements.summary: Calculate and display calories burned and step count for walk sessions
acceptanceCriteria: System calculates calories burned based on walk duration and distance
System counts steps during the walk
Calories burned and steps are displayed in the tracking interface
Walk session data (calories, steps, route) is persisted in backend

file_operations.description: Display real-time calories burned and step count during active tracking. Show session summary after stopping. Call trackWalk(session) backend method with WalkSession data (durationInSeconds, distanceInMeters, steps, caloriesBurned) to persist session.

Create utility functions to calculate calories burned based on duration, distance, and average pace. Implement step counting algorithm based on distance and stride estimates. Calculate distance from coordinate arrays.
Create component to display walk statistics including calories burned, steps taken, distance, and duration. Support both real-time updates during tracking and summary display after session.

Create statistics overview page that displays historical walk data. Load walk sessions using getWalks() backend method. Display total calories using getTotalCalories() and total steps using getTotalSteps(). Show list of past walk sessions with their metrics.

requirements.summary: Design cohesive fitness-focused visual theme with vibrant colors and motivational aesthetics
acceptanceCriteria: App uses an energetic color palette (avoiding blue and purple unless specified)
Typography choices convey motivation and boldness
Layout and spacing create an inspiring, action-oriented experience
Visual style remains consistent across all pages and features

file_operations.description: Define global CSS custom properties for energetic fitness color palette using vibrant colors (oranges, reds, yellows, greens). Set bold typography styles with motivational font choices. Apply consistent spacing and layout variables. Ensure theme colors from ThemeContext can override these base values.

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom fitness-themed color palette and typography scales. Add energetic color variants for primary, secondary, and accent colors. Configure bold font weights and inspiring font families.

Create layout wrapper component with consistent header, navigation, and footer. Apply global theme styling and ensure consistent spacing across all pages. Include navigation to all main features (landing, tracking, transformation, stats, settings).
Wrap all routes with Layout component to ensure consistent visual theme across the application.
